name: Project Zeldo
description:
The game is still a work in progress!  

DEVELOPED BY:

DRAMATIC ICEBERG 

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 3, 2020/2021)

  • Tommaso Verde (@greenest_dude)

Controls               

- A: Attack
- B: Roll
- Y: Shield
- X: Interact
- Lt + [-]: Change form
- Lt + [A]: Transform to Ram

   
- Mouse 1: Attack
- SpaceBar: Roll
- Mouse 2: Shield
- E: Interact
- TAB + [-]: Change form
- TAB + [Mouse 1]: Transform to Ram
